text: he mahecchāḥ kuta etādṛśaṁ karmma kurutha? āvāmapi yuṣmādṛśau sukhaduḥkhabhoginau manuṣyau, yuyam etāḥ sarvvā vṛthākalpanāḥ parityajya yathā gagaṇavasundharājalanidhīnāṁ tanmadhyasthānāṁ sarvveṣāñca sraṣṭāramamaram īśvaraṁ prati parāvarttadhve tadartham āvāṁ yuṣmākaṁ sannidhau susaṁvādaṁ pracārayāvaḥ|
